committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Forests, Family Farms, and Energy

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to release a reversionary interest of the United States in certain land located in Putnam County, Florida, and to direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain mineral interests of the United States in such land to the State of Florida.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to release a reversionary interest of the United States in specified land in Putnam County, Florida, in exchange for the State of Florida agreeing to a similar restriction on other land which will be acquired by Florida through exchange with the United States. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey U.S. mineral rights in the original, restricted lands. Requires the State of Florida to pay fair market value and administrative costs for the conveyance of such mineral interests.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to release a reversionary interest of the United States in certain land located in Putnam County, Florida, and to direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain mineral interests of the United States in such land to the State of Florida.
